group_1.narration: What she said about him having@a fight did surprise me but,
More than that,@what surprised me was what my friend said!
"A chance to go out with him", she said...!

group_1.textRight: I'm a bit hungry, wanna stop by somewhere?

group_1.textLeft: Aah, sorry.
I've gotta attend the play's rehearsal, so I don't@think I'll be able to...

group_1.textRight: That's right, you said you were gonna appear@on the Halloween play.
Then how about getting some apple crepes@from that store from before?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! You can eat those while walking.
Yeah, that's fine. Thanks.

group_1.textRight: I-it's not like this is for Momoko's sake!
There's no way that's true.
Anyway, you've got the sister role, right?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, don't just say it out loud.
It doesn't suit me at all. I'm very self-conscious@about it!

group_1.textRight: Huh...? But Rena...
Hadn't you said that Momoko would be perfect@for the role?

group_1.textLeft: I-it's not like I said she wouldn't be perfect for@it just now!
I was just surprised when she said she was@elected for the role...
But, does it really suit me? I'm not very refined,@you see.
Or do you have a reason for thinking so?

group_1.textRight: You're gonna MAKE me say it...!?
It's embarrassing, so I won't...

group_1.textLeft: And here I thought I could use it as a reference@for my performance.

group_1.textRight: ... If that's the case, then fine.
Well, you're always listening to me when I'm@being selfish...
No matter how hard of a time I may be having,@you always make me laugh...
But when it really counts you get really mad@at me...
You're just like a sister!

group_1.textLeft: I see... [chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]Hehe, thanks.
Karin also praised me back at the Coordinator's.
To be honest, I didn't have the slightest bit of@self-confidence until now.
But every time both of you start saying stuff@like that,
you cheer me up!

group_1.textRight: Hehehe
T-thanks for saying so!
It's a witch!

group_1.textLeft: Over there!

group_1.textRight: Here it is!

group_1.textLeft: Is everyone ready? Let's go!

group_1.textRight: Ah, it's that costume.
By the way, when will you be able to turn back@to your original form?

group_1.textLeft: Until Halloween is over.
Well, the play also has action scenes,
so I might as well use this as practice!
